line_1: Th' investing Host to raise the fruitless Siege,
line_2: But when kind Fate, or pressing Want oblige

line_1: Your speaking Life will carry on the Siege:
line_2: Let Speech lay by its Roughness to oblige,

line_1: Who neither Fight, nor raise the Siege,
line_2: Divide to Bruxelles, or to Liege.
